Description: You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health and safety of your employees in that you have failed to reduce, so far as is reasonably practicable, the potential for release of dangerous substances (flammable liquids) from pipework within the tanker bay control room, which is an area where people routinely work and unprotected electrical equipment is present, to a minimum such that personnel are not put at excessive risk of personal injury in the event of a fire.
